summary: This will be where I deposit my various Dragon retextures.
descriptionHtml:
Attention: UNDER NO CIRCUMSTANCES WILL THIS BE UPLOADED TO STEAM WORKSHOP AND NO ONE REQUESTING PERMISSION TO DO SO WILL RECEIVE IT. THIS STATEMENT OVERRIDES ANYTHING IN THE PERMISSIONS POPUP THAT IS AVAILABLE ON NEXUS THAT CONFLICTS WITH THIS STATEMENT.

Just a project that will never truly be done, because I will never stop coming up with ideas.

As I do more, I will release each group as separate packs so people can pick and choose what they want to put in their game, this first pack is just an alpha release, it's not even a complete pack.

Completed Packs:
Pack 1: This pack contains the dragon textures that as in my opinion quite a bit better than vanilla and more... "naturalized"? (I guess).

Completed Optionals:
Sinister Blood Dragon: This contains a very dark texture for the blood dragon that is mostly red and black, but has a few other colors I mixed into it as well.

Just so everyone that might be interested know, the particle effects are from http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9815 , my Dragon Aura's mod, so if you want to check that out, follow that link. :)

My Orcish armor color fix: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10720
My Rain retex: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11063
Snow Retex: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11063
author: Sepherose
